item.title: Matt Might's Blog
item.description: Background Matt Might has an awesome easy-to-read blog that has inspired us in many ways! Matt is a tenured CS professor at Utah and a visiting professor at HMS (Harvard Medical School). Heâ€™s the dad of 3 kids, one of whom has a very rare genetic disorder. He & his wife have spent a good part of their lives educating themselves and others about the disease. Some of his useful blog posts Health | Strength-training | JustDoIt HOWTO: Gain strength and muscle Least resistance weight loss Path of least resistance Handling repetitive strain injury (e.
